originalTitle: Powerful cyclone kills at least 31 as it tears through Madagascar port
title: Powerful cyclone kills at least 31 as it tears through Madagascar port
content: Madagascar's disaster management says roads are inaccessible with trees uprooted, power poles down and ninety percent of roofs ripped off.

originalTitle: South African Epstein survivor calls on UK Royal Family to search Andrew's files
title: South African Epstein survivor calls on UK Royal Family to search Andrew's files
content: Juliette Bryant has called on the Palace to "act" on revelations about Andrew's relationship with Epstein.

originalTitle: Ghanaians embrace 'Fugu Day' after online mockery of traditional outfits
title: Ghanaians embrace 'Fugu Day' after online mockery of traditional outfits
content: The iconic attire has been trending online for days following the banter between Ghanaians and Zambians.

originalTitle: LIVE: India vs Namibia – T20 World Cup
title: LIVE: India vs Namibia – T20 World Cup
content: Follow our live build-up, with toss and teams coverage, ahead of our full text commentary stream of the Group A match.

originalTitle: Ukraine’s Heraskevych disqualified from Olympics skeleton over helmet
title: Ukraine’s Heraskevych disqualified from Olympics skeleton over helmet
content: IOC bans Vladyslav Heraskevych for repeatedly wearing helmet that depicts Ukrainian athletes killed in war with Russia.

originalTitle: Voters flock to polling stations as Bangladesh holds landmark election
title: Voters flock to polling stations as Bangladesh holds landmark election
content: The people of Bangladesh are voting in the first truly competitive election in 17 years.

originalTitle: Police identify 18-year-old as suspect in Tumbler Ridge shooting
title: Police identify 18-year-old as suspect in Tumbler Ridge shooting
content: A candlelit vigil was held on Wednesday night in the remote British Columbia town where six people were killed and dozens injured.

originalTitle: Kim Jong Un chooses teen daughter as heir, says Seoul
title: Kim Jong Un chooses teen daughter as heir, says Seoul
content: South Korea's spy agency says Ki Ju Ae's prominent public presence indicates she is the chosen heir.

originalTitle: Four takeaways from Pam Bondi's fiery Epstein testimony
title: Four takeaways from Pam Bondi's fiery Epstein testimony
content: Lawmakers accused Bondi's justice department of making improper redactions to Epstein files as she fired back.

title: Tuchel extends deal with England
content: Thomas Tuchel commits to two more years as England manager, which will take him through to Euro 2028.

originalTitle: Lucky break that changed Alexander-Arnold's Real future
title: Lucky break that changed Alexander-Arnold's Real future
content: Trent Alexander-Arnold endured a difficult start at Real Madrid but his prospects are looking up - and it might earn him a ticket to the World Cup.

originalTitle: Forest open Pereira talks after sacking Dyche
title: Forest open Pereira talks after sacking Dyche
content: Nottingham Forest sack Sean Dyche as head coach after just 114 days in charge, with former Wolves boss Vitor Pereira in talks to replace him.
